dcterms:creator: Zahra Karimaghaloo
Douglas L Arnold
Tal Arbel
dcterms:description: A large multi-centre, multi-scanner proprietary dataset comprised of MRI scans from 1067 patients undergoing a clinical trial to treat Relapsing Remitting MS. The dataset includes five 3D brain MRI sequences and expert Gad lesion masks.
dcterms:title: Gadolinium-enhancing lesion dataset
